actions.recommendation: Clinically you examine well. Your blood pressure was slightly raised. We will need to repeat this in a few weeks again.
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear
Working on building healthy rhythms of exercise and nutrition into your daily life will have a positive impact on your body. It will help prevent future chronic illness.
Regular self-breast examinations are recommended. If you detect any irregularities, you can review with your known family GP or Gynae.
I am glad to hear that youâ€™ve been seen and reviewed by a Gynaecologist. You are due another Pap Smear this year. This can be done with your known Gynae.
